attributes.action: Stop government departments (i.e. Job Centre, Pensions Departement) using 0845 phone numbers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Today Mr. Brown asked businesses to stop increasing costs and thus increase public spending.  What he needs to do is to put a stop to people having to spend up to 6p a minute for phone charges to government numbers! Even the doctor has this now and they are making money out of us!
